Package uk.ac.ncl.undergraduate.modules.csc3621.cryptanalysis.easyfreq

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FrequencyAnalyser
    This class is to compute a frequency table of a texts.
    FrequencyCryptanalysis
    This class is for frequency cryptanalysis of ciphertext when the key is an integer.
    FrequencyTable
    An instance of this class is a mapping of 26 indexes (corresponding to English alphabet) to relative frequencies.
    Util
    This class contains generic methods that can be used throughout the implementation in all contexts.
    VigenereCipher
    This class is capable of encrypt and decrypt according to the Vigenère cipher.
    VigenereCryptanalysis
    This class is for frequency cryptanalysis of ciphertext.
